code: import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'../styles/projectcode.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TemperatureConverter=()=>{const[kelvin,setKelvin]=useState('');const[results,setResults]=useState(null);const handleConvert=()=>{const kelvinValue=parseFloat(kelvin);if(isNaN(kelvinValue)){alert('Please enter a valid number');return;}const celsius=kelvinValue-273;const fahrenheit=Math.floor(celsius*(9/5)+32);const newton=Math.floor(celsius*(33/100));setResults({fahrenheit,newton,celsius});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.landing,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Interactive Temperature Converter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.main,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Enter temperature in Kelvin:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:kelvin,onChange:e=>setKelvin(e.target.value)})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleConvert,children:"Convert"}),results&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.results,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Celsius:"})," ",results.celsius,"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Fahrenheit:"})," ",results.fahrenheit,"\xB0F"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Newton:"})," ",results.newton,"\xB0N"]})]})]});};export default TemperatureConverter;
